sentence.Network_en: He also wants to use the water to irrigate barren desert land.
sentence.Network_cn: 他也想用这些水灌溉荒漠。

sentence.Network_en: The farmer dug several trenches to irrigate the rice fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个农民挖了好几条沟以灌溉稻田.

sentence.Network_en: They have built canals to irrigate the desert.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... irony 反语 irrigate 灌溉，滋润，使清新， isolate 使孤立，隔离.
英语字根表 ... irregular 不规则的用在r前 irrigate 灌入水，灌溉用在r前 isotope 同位素.
浇开头的词语 | 常用词典 | 中华博物 ... ◆ 浇薄[  unkind ] ◆ 浇灌[ irrigate ] ◆ 浇料[  wash ].
沃_百度百科 ... ⑵ 同本义[ water] ⑷ 大水量的灌溉[ irrigate] ⑻ 饮，喝[ drink].

list.abs: 漫_百度百科 ... 漫灌[ basin irrigation] 漫灌[ flow;flood irrigation] 漫画[ caricature;cartoon].
irrigation 灌溉irrigation canal 灌溉渠irrigation network 灌溉网
滴灌（drip irrigation）是利用塑料管道将水通过直径约10mm毛管上的孔口或滴头送到作物根部进行局部灌溉。它是目前干旱缺水地区 …
灌溉农业(Irrigated farming)通常指以水利灌溉设施为保障,满足作物对水份要求以获得稳产高产的农业。灌溉的作用除满足水分的需要外,还可以调节土壤温度、湿度、土壤.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin irrigat- 'moistened', from the verb irrigare, from in- 'into' + rigare 'moisten, wet'

entry.def: To irrigate land means to supply it with water in order to help crops grow.

example.ex: None of the water from Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
example.tran: 鲍威尔湖的水一滴都没有用于灌溉该地区。

example.ex: ...strips of cultivated land irrigated by a maze of interconnected canals.
example.tran: 由纵横交错的运河灌溉的一条条狭长耕地区域

means.word_mean: 1. supply with water, as with channels or ditches or streams;
2. supply with a constant flow or sprinkling of some liquid, for the purpose of cooling, cleansing, or disinfecting;

auth_sentence.content: May a tainted blood irrigate our furrows!
auth_sentence.res_content: May a tainted blood irrigate our furrows!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: May a tainted blood irrigate our furrows!

auth_sentence.content: Irrigate those canals and then we'll have beef for dinner!
auth_sentence.res_content: Irrigate those canals and then we'll have beef for dinner!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Irrigate those canals and then we'll have beef for dinner!

auth_sentence.content: If you want anything growing besides native things, you have to irrigate.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you want anything growing besides native things, you have to irrigate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you want anything growing besides native things, you have to irrigate.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不顾的, 不考虑的, 无关的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不,无+respective各自的→adj.不顾的, 不考虑的, 无关的
ir不,无+reproachable能被指责的→adj.无可指责的
ir不,无+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
ir不,无+resolute果断的→adj.无决断力的
ir不,无+refutable可反驳的→adj.无可反驳的
ir不,无+revocable可取消的→adj.不可取消的
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rupt断+ion表名词→打断[别人]→闯入
ir不+regularity整齐, 匀称→n.不规则,无规律
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rig水+ate表动词→进水→灌溉
ir使……,成为,进入,再+rit擦+ate表动词→进入磨擦→激怒
ir使……,成为,进入,再+radi光线+ate表动词→发光→生辉

Sentence.sentence: Better irrigation can dramatically improve crop yield and about 40% of the world's food supply is currently derived from irrigated land.

sentences.en: They have built canals to irrigate the desert.
sentences.cn: 他们建造成水渠以灌溉沙漠。
